COURSE NAME: Certified in Cybersecurity (CC)

COURSE OVERVIEW: The course is designed to provide foundational knowledge and expand horizons in the field of cybersecurity. It is offered by the School of High-Tech and Cyber at Bar-Ilan University, which is an official ISC2 academy in Israel.

COURSE SCHEDULE: The course starts on November 6, 2024. It consists of 4 sessions, each lasting 20 academic hours. Classes are held on Sundays and Wednesdays from 17:30 to 21:30.

LEARNING FORMAT: The course is hybrid, allowing students to choose between attending classes on the Bar-Ilan University campus in Ramat Gan or participating via Zoom.

COURSE TOPICS: The course covers the following topics:
- Security Principles
- Business Continuity (BC), Disaster Recovery (DR) & Incident Response Concepts
- Access Controls Concepts
- Network Security
- Security Operations

REGISTRATION AND CONTACT INFORMATION: To schedule an admission interview and register, contact Esther Asulin at 052-5886002 or via email at esther.asulin@biu.ac.il.

INSTITUTIONAL INFORMATION: Bar-Ilan University is a leading institution in Israel, offering this course through its School of High-Tech and Cyber, which is recognized as an official ISC2 academy.
